activities: ICOMM is a global Telecommunications Management service provider.  We provide support services for telephony and telecommunications environments for our customers. In the course of providing those service, ICOMM often requires a minimal amount of personal information of our customers employees, including employee name, email address, work location and cost center and manager information.  That data is securely stored in SQL databases, only accessible via a SSLv3 web site with authorized user access only (via a user ID and password).  In certain countries, we do not store this information based upon business rules and local regulations.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational data, employee data and employee data, and all of the data is processed electronically.
recoursemech: ICOMM will be using the EU DPAs and Swiss FDPIC for organization human resources data; and ICDR, a division of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program), for all other data.
